name: Spaghettis 5 Year Anniversary Collection
description:
What is this?

It is my 5 Year Anniversary! On this day (February 17) in 2017, my game Rule The World In Peace was released and I have been creative ever since!

RIGHT NOW

Everything is on 100% Sale for a week too!

https://itch.io/s/67244/5-year-anniversary-goodie-bag

Please enjoy a bunch of goodies :D

What's included?

  • Absolutely Stunning Background-Image painted by Zee Arts!
  • A Rainmeter Skinpack! (With animated fish (from Zee Arts) and a dancing Pokoto! (thanks to Basic Vanilla!))
  • The just-released Luluphone for UVI Falcon!
  • A one-pager comic! (Made by Mathew D. Rhys from Ideal Comics!)
  • An awesome Pokoto-Companion for your FL Studio if you use it!
  • Video-Ringtones in 2 sizes, 1080x2160 and 1080x1920!

Luluphone installation:

Unpack the archive to any folder on your pc, open UVI Falcon and load the Luluphone program! Enjoy making music with it! What a crazy instrument it is :D

Rainmeter Skin installation:

Download and install Rainmeter here, download the rainmeter zip file, it contains the stunning wallpaper created by Zee Arts, set it as your desktop wallpaper. You should be able to just open the rainmeter skin file like any program, it will give you a little installation dialogue. After it is installed you should find that your desktop looks amazing now, and I've added a special goodie, every full hour, the clock will play a gong, how cool is that?!

Comic:

Just open it and read :D

Pokoto Companion for FL Studio installation:

Download  the Pokoto Companion Zip and unpack it to this path on windows:

C:\Program Files\Image-Line\FL Studio 20\Plugins\Fruity\Generators\Fruity Dance\Artwork

Open up FL and load the Fruity Dance plugin, click the little folder icon and you should be sent to the folder where you just unpacked the animation and presto! Pokoto will now dance to the rhythm of your beats :D Huge shoutouts to Basic Vanilla for the animation!

All of these files are offered for private use only, re-offering any of them is strictly prohibited, and so is the sale of these files.

You are allowed to use the Luluphone sound in any of your tracks, no strings attached and you don't need to pay any royalties, the sounds must not be isolated but when used in your songs as normal, it is fine.

Shoutouts go out to the amazing artists!
